div.span: Indian Hill School District Important Announcements

a.strong: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine extends K-12 closure through remainder of 2019-2020 school year.
Are you a District family needing assistance during this time? Click here to access our Braves Helping Braves program.
Click here to access our Coronavirus Information website.

[Cancelled] PS Primary Players Spring Program at PS

div.p: To create magic in the classroom, to generate a spark for our students – encouraging each student to think, to question, to grow.

We promise to provide your child with unparalleled opportunities in academics, the arts, and athletics … to get to know your child’s individual talents and interests … to support the beauty of the diversity in all our students.

div.span: The Indian Hill Exempted Village School District provides exceptional educational services to ensure the intellectual development, personal growth, and social responsibility of each student.
